adDetails: SO...YOU HAVE PLANNED EVERYTHING AND SPENT SO MUCH MONEY PLANNING EVERYTHING FOR YOUR "BIG DAY". HOW ABOUT YOUR WEDDING DANCE??? WOULD YOU LIKE TO GUEST OR THAT SPECIAL SOMEBODY???
